full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify
#### EZ899-241045 Concrete Stair and Sidewalk Restoration, and Railing Replacement (Phase 1-ITQ)

**Reference Number**: WS4288884641-Doc4300760117
**Publication Date**: November 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: November 27, 2023 2:00 PM

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada invites qualified contractors to submit their qualifications for the concrete stair and sidewalk restoration, and railing replacement at the Mission Medium Institution in Mission, British Columbia.

**Scope of Work**
The successful contractor will be required to:

* Restore concrete stairs
* Restore and repair sidewalk
* Replace railing

**Contract Requirements**

* The contract is scheduled to commence on January 9, 2024
* The estimated contract end date is May 31, 2024
* The selected contractor must have a Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) certification

**Tendering Information**
Tenders are to be submitted through the Ariba Discovery platform using the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17968352?extsite=MTc5NjgzNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17968352?extsite=MTc5NjgzNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender opportunity, please contact:

Michaela Costa
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: [No phone number provided]
Email: [michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Please note**
This tender opportunity has expired on November 27, 2023. Applications submitted after the closing date and time will not be accepted.
